name: Send Random Interjections (Mad-Libber)
short_description: When this autohotkey script (or an executable compiled therefrom) is loaded, while a user types, it randomly inserts prank words of your choosing, at a frequency (really a random chance or "dice roll") that you can also choose. Type randominterject <then space or enter> while it runs to set the "dice roll." You would be wise to only choose words that are benign and/or funny, and to only use this to pull pranks on somebody with a good sense of humor.
summary: Inserts prank phrases as you type. Set the odds and insertion phrases.
